meanings.sent1: She individualises her artwork by adding colorful patterns.
meanings.sent2: The artist individualises each painting with a signature style.
meanings.sent3: He individualises his cupcakes by decorating them with tiny edible flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity individualises her work from that of other artists.
meanings.sent5: The unique brush strokes individualises her paintings in the art gallery.

meanings.sent1: The special logo individualises the brand from its competitors.
meanings.sent2: Each fingerprint individualises a person from everyone else.
meanings.sent3: The detective individualises the suspect by analyzing the footprints.
meanings.sent4: The bright red color individualises the flower in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The distinct scent individualises the perfume on the shelf.

meanings.definition: Give personal or unique characteristics to.
meanings.sent1: She individualises her gifts by adding handmade cards.
meanings.sent2: The tailor individualises each suit to fit the customer perfectly.
meanings.sent3: He individualises his car by customizing the license plate.
meanings.sent4: The chef individualises each dish with a special secret ingredient.
meanings.sent5: The teacher individualises her approach to help each student succeed.
